Comment: Honestly, I'm sure I'll get down voted, but I felt this was the most sane interview I've ever heard from Trump.  - He said "I don't know" several times and deferred to his lawyers.  - He acknowledged the importance of dissent to democracy.  - He essentially said the economic benefits of tariffs were worth a recession and economic dislocation  - He said he doesn't believe a 3rd term is possible and looks forward to passing the torch to great Republicans  To me, this version of Trump is far more dangerous to me. His still has untenable positions, but with a much more sane and less confrontational delivery
